messages.title: Why we are backing Fiona
messages.content: Endorsements from Dr Henna Khan, Tony and Lynne Smeaton, and Philip Johns highlighting their personal reasons for supporting Fiona.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Guarantee GP appointment within 48 hours and expanded services at Wexham Park Hospital and improved social care.
Plans to support young people, delivering fair funding for sixth forms, ensuring every student is studying for qualifications which help them get good jobs or training for the long-term jobless.
Plans to build new, affordable homes, create longer tenancies and tackle rogue landlords with fair rents and new rights.
Cutting business rates for local retailers and small businesses as well as offering them loans.

issues.economy: Cutting business rates for local retailers and small businesses as well as offering them loans.
issues.education: Delivering fair funding for sixth forms, ensuring every student is studying for qualifications which help them get good jobs or training for the long-term jobless.
issues.health: Guarantee GP appointment within 48 hours and expanded services at Wexham Park Hospital and improved social care.

housing.content: Plans to build new, affordable homes, create longer tenancies and tackle rogue landlords with fair rents and new rights.

endorsements.endorsement: Supporting Fiona for being a diligent and caring doctor, and advocating better health and housing.
Backing Fiona for working hard to protect families and their homes.
Supporting Fiona for helping people find work and tackle the problems they face.
